name: Word Crush - Fun Word Smith Game for Thinkers
name_original: Word Crush - Fun Word Smith Game for Thinkers
description:
Word Crush, letters are arranged on colorful tiles that come crashing down if you wait too long to make a move. Test your ability to think under pressure as well as your vocabulary on a whole with this new and exciting mobile app.

Players can create words by tapping a column to select a tile which has a letter and then tapping another column to move it to that location. Words can be created both horizontally and vertically and as soon as you form a word, the tiles become highlighted. This is when you move quickly to crush the word and get rid of the tiles before you end up crushed. Bombs are available throughout the game to give you the opportunity to escape especially when you are cornered by tiles. Use them to get rid of nearby bombs and any tile that is within reach.

Always remember to grab, rearrange and crush as quickly as you can! Time is always against you in this fun and exciting game so think fast. Raise the bar and challenge yourself to see how far you will go. Don't forget to include family and friends, so they too can experience the excitement when you download this app. Word Crush is innovative and will undoubtedly become addictive to every app lover. Crush and go today!
